title: DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION
description: The DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION is the minimal description of the DEVICE for use in the PRODUCT CONFIGURATION.

id.title: productId
id.description: Unique identifier of the object DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION.

uopSapCode.title: unitOfPresentation.sapCode
uopSapCode.description: The SAP Code is the unique identifier from SAP to identity the data record.

uopRefId.title: unitOfPresentation.referenceDataId
uopRefId.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

primaryPackagingForConfigurationId.description: Unique identifier of the object PRIMARY PACKAGING FOR CONFIGURATION.

brandedDevice.title: brandedDevice
brandedDevice.description:
The attribute Branded Device specifices whether
1. the DEVICE is unbranded, thus has no Brand Name and thus does not add to the GLOBAL or LOCAL BRAND Name or

2. the DEVICE is branded, thus brings a GLOBAL BRAND Name. The GLOBAL BRAND name may come from the DRUG PRODUCT to be used (this is called "cross-labelling") or the DEVICE brings its own GLOBAL BRAND Name. 
This element is deprecated. The data type should be boolean and not string.

globalBrandId.description: Unique identifier of the object GLOBAL BRAND.

description.title: description
description.description: The TEXT is any human readible text. It may be unstructured data ("free text") or it may be generated from structured data ("auto text"). It may have different maximum length. It may occur in different LANGUAGEs and WRITING SYSTEMs.

administrationLimit.title: administrationLimit
administrationLimit.description: Administration Limit is the limit of a DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION administering a DRUG PRODUCT FOR CONFIGURATION.

nominalVolume.title: nominalVolume.nominalVolume
nominalVolume.description: The Nominal Volume is the volume that a container is designed to hold, leaving a defined volume of headspace in the container. With that, the Nominal Volume is smaller than the Maximum Volume, which is the maximum volume a container can hold, leaving no headspace volume.

nominalVolumeUomSapCode.title: nominalVolume.unitOfMeasure.sapCode
nominalVolumeUomSapCode.description: The unconverted Code in Column MSEHI of SAP table T006.

physicalAppearance.description: This element is deprecated. DEVICE FOR CONFIGUTAION has no PHYSICAL APPEARANCE. The attribute Nominal Volume has been added separately

prevailingId.title: prevailingId
prevailingId.description:
One DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION must have a Prevailing ID if its GLOBAL LIFECYCLE STATUS is set to 99, duplicate (1). Otherwise the Prevailing ID remains empty (0).
This directs the user to the prevailing DEVICE FOR CONFIGURATION.
